item.title: Jose Aldo Misses Weight At UFC 315 — Fight Saved By Sudden Switch
item.description: Jose Aldo’s fight with Aiemann Zahabi at UFC 315 has been shifted to featherweight after Aldo’s weight cut struggles threatened to cancel the bout.
